alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 06 at 12:15PM CDT until October 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, southwest Minnesota and east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From midnight CDT tonight through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
